about_the_game:
Drive, repair, upgrade and customize your trucks to navigate desolate wastelands and deserted cities, alone or with friends.

Do you have what it takes to grow your Post Apocalypse Courier Service (P.A.C.S.) from a small-time garage operation to national mega corp., and become the best in the wasteland?

MudRunner meets Euro Truck Simulator 2 meets Mad Max reimagined as a post apocalyptic delivery driving simulator.

  • Deliver parcels alone or with friends to take P.A.C.S. from small-time garage operation to national mega corp.

  • Drive through extreme conditions and navigate treacherous terrain

  • Scavenge for parts and repair your vehicles

  • Customize and upgrade your vehicles including suspension, gearbox, engine, fuel tank and more

  • Sort parcels, manage your inventory and strategically utilize vehicle capacity

Navigate a desolate but beautifully diverse wasteland, from treacherously icy peaks to sandy dunes and grimy, muddy, flooded swamps.

Keep an eye out for parts to scavenge – you never know when you may find a spare tire or truck part left behind by those less fortunate. Get your hands dirty with repairs, and upgrade your truck’s suspension, gearbox, engine, fuel tank and more.

Manage your inventory as you sort and pack parcels. Utilize your vehicle’s capacity and carefully consider which parcels to deliver along your journey.

While going it alone is a completely valid option, Post Apocalypse Delivery Simulator: Multiplayer Courier Delivery supports co-op multiplayer for up to four players. Play your way and head out with friends for a relaxing, slow-paced drive or squad up with teammates to take on serious delivery jobs together.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 64bit OS
  • Processor: i5-3570K 3.4 GHz 4 Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 970 4GB / AMD RX 580 4GB
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: Can you build delivery vehicles to survive the post apocalypse? Go it alone or with up to 4 friends as you navigate treacherous environments, make deliveries, customise vehicles, scavenge for parts, and grow your delivery business! Get ready for a thrilling off-road experience - wishlist now!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Turkish
